#Numi anu flux, Feb 12, from Arturo; from 0.1 GeV to 10 GeV
beam_type=0

# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = -14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1

beam_energy = 100  10000  3.47321e-06  6.81065e-06  8.35967e-06  8.18354e-06  9.05256e-06  1.11997e-05  1.32676e-05  1.86111e-05  2.44458e-05  2.833e-05  3.46783e-05  3.88509e-05  4.47056e-05  4.77954e-05  5.01586e-05  5.35734e-05  5.62342e-05  5.99799e-05  6.25154e-05  6.63875e-05  7.02396e-05  7.23154e-05  7.76276e-05  8.05164e-05  8.35444e-05  8.52995e-05  8.89602e-05  9.12377e-05  9.29404e-05  9.30189e-05  9.18555e-05  8.98113e-05  8.87347e-05  8.57128e-05  8.0644e-05  7.56078e-05  7.00666e-05  6.4028e-05  5.85138e-05  5.20563e-05  4.64588e-05  4.02725e-05  3.63127e-05  3.10053e-05  2.6735e-05  2.36763e-05  2.11674e-05  1.8587e-05  1.633e-05  1.44285e-05  1.31986e-05  1.15018e-05  1.09928e-05  1.00359e-05  9.10216e-06  8.18576e-06  7.76833e-06  7.10183e-06  6.39274e-06  6.25886e-06  5.87694e-06  5.68424e-06  5.39327e-06  5.40602e-06  4.86346e-06  4.7955e-06  4.32497e-06  4.31582e-06  4.20404e-06  3.7434e-06  3.90065e-06  3.65224e-06  3.72883e-06  3.16421e-06  3.41293e-06  3.14515e-06  3.23853e-06  2.98751e-06  2.90912e-06  2.83407e-06  2.91681e-06  2.61634e-06  2.38107e-06  2.50862e-06  2.4524e-06  2.23833e-06  2.33144e-06  2.18921e-06  2.25749e-06  2.12191e-06  2.18098e-06  1.98329e-06  1.89524e-06  1.98686e-06  1.80309e-06  1.78237e-06  1.62037e-06  1.69751e-06  1.79921e-06
